In order to demonstrate compliance, developments will be expected to provide details within the planning application statement identifying how they have met the principles outlined above. Development proposals should consider these principles from the outset and are encouraged to engage with the council through preapplications where appropriate to ensure they are meaningfully met. 11.24 Part 1(c) seeks to address the need to achieve a clean and green future for the borough, a key priority in the councilâ€™s Strategic Plan (2022 DELIVERING THE LOCAL PLAN
